Welcome to Celeste’s documentation!¶

Celeste is a chemical reaction-mechanism discovery code developed by the group of Prof. Scott Habershon in the Department of Chemistry at the University of Warwick, UK.

This documentation provides examples of how to run Celeste, typical input file structures, and notes on output files.

In addition, API documentation for the Celeste python package is included - this also contains lots of useful information about the code too.
